mapper.update:
update xd_resource_distribution
resources_id = #{resourcesId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
assignor_id = #{assignorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
assignor_name = #{assignorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
assignor_workno = #{assignorWorkno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
commerce_id = #{commerceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dis_time = #{disTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
response_flag = #{responseFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
response_time = #{responseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
dis_type = #{disType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where distribution_id = #{distributionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update xd_resource_distribution set resources_id = #{resourcesId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, assignor_id = #{assignorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, assignor_name = #{assignorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, assignor_workno = #{assignorWorkno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, commerce_id = #{commerceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dis_time = #{disTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, response_flag = #{responseFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, response_time = #{responseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dis_type = #{disType,jdbcType=INTEGER} where distribution_id = #{distributionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update xd_resource_distribution set response_flag = #{responseFlag} where resources_id = #{resourcesId} and commerce_id = #{salesmanId} ORDER BY dis_time DESC LIMIT 1

update xd_resource_distribution set response_flag = #{responseFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, response_time = #{nowTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where resources_id = #{resourcesId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by dis_time desc limit 1
